CN.content:

2. Material Name - Oxide (mentioned in the context of its voltage)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies for including irrelevant entities earlier. Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph:

1. Oxide (Material Name)

Certainly! Here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Oxide |
